content:
It told me to do nvcc I had to run this: 
sudo apt install nvidia-cuda-toolkit

nvcc: NVIDIA (R) Cuda compiler driver
Copyright (c) 2005-2021 NVIDIA Corporation
Built on Thu_Nov_18_09:45:30_PST_2021
Cuda compilation tools, release 11.5, V11.5.119
Build cuda_11.5.r11.5/compiler.30672275_0

Then I got this, looks like a lot to install. Is there an easier way to do this than running all these commands separately?
ommand 'nvidia-smi' not found, but can be installed with:
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-390         # version 390.157-0ubuntu0.22.04.2, or (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-418-server  # version 418.226.00-0ubuntu5~0.22.04.1 (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-450-server  # version 450.248.02-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-470         # version 470.256.02-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-470-server  # version 470.256.02-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-535         # version 535.183.01-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-535-server  # version 535.230.02-0ubuntu0.22.04.3 (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-550         # version 550.120-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-550-server  # version 550.144.03-0ubuntu0.22.04.1 (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-570-server  # version 570.86.15-0ubuntu0.22.04.4 (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-510         # version 510.60.02-0ubuntu1 (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-510-server  # version 510.47.03-0ubuntu3 (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-545         # version 545.29.06-0ubuntu0.22.04.2 (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
sudo apt install nvidia-utils-565-server  # version 565.57.01-0ubuntu0.22.04.4 (You will have to enable component called 'restricted')
